## Source: amazon-inspector (0210683c3480535deb828dc6e3f758815b2a57ae4a50c37dca6443ad61623aa4)
The package karemz was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0ea2cd139758da9c9339894a56f0250a834c2fb01f4b25c9e398daef8c61c992)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karemz' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
